Text.Page:
Seeking the Floating Stone, are we? Good, good. You've found the best way to get to it. Just over there is the Cliffside Airship Platform.

I use it to cross the rift when I need to, but I can set it up so that it will drop you off in the Garden of Yativioâ€”if you think you're ready.

Has anyone warned you about Yativio? It's the king of corpse flowers, and when Yativio's body glows red, you'd better run.
